entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpfm2vjfr7\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 158,632,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 317,264,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 101130 - Disclosure - Pension Plans and Other Postretirement Benefits - Fair Values of Company's Pension Plan Assets by Asset Category (Detail) with the uri http://www.mtb.com/20191231/taxonomy/role/DisclosurePensionPlansAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsFairValuesOfCompanySPensionPlanAssetsByAssetCategoryDetail. The values of the calculation components are as follows: HedgeFundsMember --> 75,502,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member GuaranteedDepositFundMember --> 10,415,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:GuaranteedDepositFundMember DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember --> 9,016,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member OtherSecuritiesMember --> 158,632,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:OtherSecuritiesMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 63,699,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 158,632,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel3Member Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7645 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/36270/000156459020005365/mtb-10k_20191231.htm 88064

property.name: label
property.value: Defined Benefit Plan Fair Value Of Plan Assets

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 300,101,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 587,947,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 101130 - Disclosure - Pension Plans and Other Postretirement Benefits - Fair Values of Company's Pension Plan Assets by Asset Category (Detail) with the uri http://www.mtb.com/20191231/taxonomy/role/DisclosurePensionPlansAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsFairValuesOfCompanySPensionPlanAssetsByAssetCategoryDetail. The values of the calculation components are as follows: CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 103,672,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember DefinedBenefitPlanDebtSecurityMember --> 287,846,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanDebtSecurityMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 182,034,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember ForeignGovernmentDebtSecuritiesMember --> 2,140,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ForeignGovernmentDebtSecuritiesMember MoneyMarketInvestmentsMember --> 12,255,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:MoneyMarketInvestmentsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 300,101,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member Unit : USD

4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.

us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:MoneyMarketInvestmentsMember DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesUsMember --> 219,663,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesUsMember MAndTEquitySecuritiesMember --> 148,603,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:MAndTEquitySecuritiesMember HedgeFundsMember --> 231,807,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember GuaranteedDepositFundMember --> 10,527,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:GuaranteedDepositFundMember DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember --> 21,905,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember OtherSecuritiesMember --> 439,185,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:OtherSecuritiesMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 87,966,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 2,035,878,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7645 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/36270/000156459020005365/mtb-10k_20191231.htm 87039

property.name: label
property.value: Defined Benefit Plan Fair Value Of Plan Assets

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 1,831,773,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 3,640,497,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 101130 - Disclosure - Pension Plans and Other Postretirement Benefits - Fair Values of Company's Pension Plan Assets by Asset Category (Detail) with the uri http://www.mtb.com/20191231/taxonomy/role/DisclosurePensionPlansAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsFairValuesOfCompanySPensionPlanAssetsByAssetCategoryDetail. The values of the calculation components are as follows: CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 103,672,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember OtherDiversifiedMutualFundMember --> 74,446,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:OtherDiversifiedMutualFundMember DefinedBenefitPlanDebtSecurityMember --> 589,409,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanDebtSecurityMember USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 182,034,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesNonUsMember --> 7,752,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesNonUsMember DomesticMutualFundDebtSecuritiesMember --> 280,902,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:DomesticMutualFundDebtSecuritiesMember ForeignGovernmentDebtSecuritiesMember --> 2,140,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ForeignGovernmentDebtSecuritiesMember DomesticMutualFundEquitySecuritiesMember --> 216,523,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:DomesticMutualFundEquitySecuritiesMember DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesMember --> 858,137,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesMember InternationalMutualFundEquitySecuritiesMember --> 316,923,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:InternationalMutualFundEquitySecuritiesMember MoneyMarketInvestmentsMember --> 23,049,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:MoneyMarketInvestmentsMember DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesUsMember --> 191,640,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanEquitySecuritiesUsMember MAndTEquitySecuritiesMember --> 125,299,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:MAndTEquitySecuritiesMember HedgeFundsMember --> 200,811,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember GuaranteedDepositFundMember --> 10,415,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:GuaranteedDepositFundMember DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember --> 11,807,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanRealEstateMember InternationalMutualFundDebtSecuritiesMember --> 20,661,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:InternationalMutualFundDebtSecuritiesMember OtherSecuritiesMember --> 361,178,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=mtb:OtherSecuritiesMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 63,699,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 1,831,773,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
